alert.note: Alert for Northeast Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 5:48PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Aroostook County through 630 PM EDT... At 548 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Nashville Plantation to 8 miles south of Russel Crossing. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Portage, Washburn, Ashland, Woodland, Portage Lake, Masardis, Oxbow, Russel Crossing, Nashville Plantation, Scopan, Castle Hill, Perham, Wade, Squa Pan, Garfield and Nashville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
